item.title: [Javascript] Dynamic Background
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Why not have it change the hue slightly instead of just picking a completely random colour?

Read full topic

item.title: [Javascript] Dynamic Background
item.dc:creator: @pkerjosh13 pkerjosh13
item.description:
@pkerjosh13 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:11, topic:534141”][quote author=runeite51 link=topic=652937.msg4378116#msg4378116 date=1382665702]

this is useless not to mention it will cause problems for certain people (epileptics) So you should implement on it a popup warning, and give the option to disable the function.

Yeah if the colors contrast too much and change too quickly that could be an issue.
[/quote]don’t they take medicine these days to prevent this anyway?[/quote]

It is still a recurring issue and the chance is always there, better safe then sorry, you dont want people to crawl up your ass because they had a seizure because of the colour change and there was no warning of it

Read full topic

item.title: [Javascript] Dynamic Background
item.dc:creator: @runeite51 runeite51
item.description:
@runeite51 wrote:

You can use JQuery… Find a way to separate the body tag into columns and rows, by percentage. Set each column to fade to a different background color when that certain area is hovered over. The speed of the website will depend on how many columns and rows you have, the less the better.

Read full topic

item.title: [Javascript] Dynamic Background
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

window.onload = function() { this.onmousemove = function() { document.body.style.background = '#'+Math.floor(Math.random()*91237498).toString(14); } }
This is something I threw together for fun. What this does is makes the background of your website change its color as your mouse moves across the page.

Some others I’ve found:

[code=javascript]var $win = $(window),
w = 0,h = 0,
rgb = [],
getWidth = function() {
w = $win.width();
h = $win.height();
};

$win.resize(getWidth).mousemove(function(e) {

rgb = [
    Math.round(e.pageX/w * 255),
    Math.round(e.pageY/h * 255),
    150
];

$(document.body).css('background','rgb('+rgb.join(',')+')');

}).resize();
[/code]

[code=javascript]<!–

function stopError() { return true; }
window.onerror = stopError;

preload1 = new Image(); preload1.src = ‘24_16m_i.gif’;
preload2 = new Image(); preload2.src = ‘24_16m.gif’;
preload3 = new Image(); preload3.src = ‘24_216.gif’;
preload4 = new Image(); preload4.src = ‘24_216_i.gif’;

file://var total = 7 * 255;
var total = 6 * 255 + 127;

var arrR = new Array(total);
var arrG = new Array(total);
var arrB = new Array(total);

var NN = (window.Event) ? 1 : 0;
var IE = (document.all) ? 1 : 0;
var theX = 0;
var adjX = 0;
var theY = 0;
var theWidth = 0;
var theHeight = 0;
var Ydiff = 0;
var R = 0;
var G = 0;
var B = 0;
var websafe = 0;
var onImg = 0;

var hexChars = “0123456789ABCDEF”;
function Dec2Hex (Dec) {
var a = Dec % 16;
var b = (Dec - a)/16;
hex = “” + hexChars.charAt(b) + hexChars.charAt(a);
return hex;
}

for (var i=0; i<256; i++) {
arrR[i] = 255;
arrR[2255-i] = i;
arrR[i+2*255] = 0;
arrR[i+3*255] = 0;
arrR[i+4*255] = i;
arrR[6255-i] = 255;
file://if (i<255) arrR[i+6*255] = 255;
if (i<255) arrR[i/2+6*255] = 127;

arrG[i] = i;
arrG[i+255] = 255;
arrG[i+2*255] = 255;
arrG[4*255-i] = i;
arrG[i+4*255] = 0;
arrG[i+5*255] = 0;
file://if (i<255) arrG[i+6*255] = 255;
if (i<255) arrG[i/2+6*255] = 127;

arrB[i] = 0;
arrB[i+255] = 0;
arrB[i+2*255] = i;
arrB[i+3*255] = 255;
arrB[i+4*255] = 255;
arrB[6*255-i] = i;
file://if (i<255) arrB[i+6*255] = 255;
if (i<255) arrB[i/2+6*255] = 127;
}

function showbg(e) {
prompt(‘DEC: (’ + R + ‘,’ + G + ‘,’ + B +
’)\nHEX:’,document.bgColor.toUpperCase());
}

function squeak(e) {
if (NN) {
theX = e.pageX;
theY = e.pageY;
theWidth = window.innerWidth;
theHeight = window.innerHeight;
} else { if (IE) {
theX = event.clientX + document.body.scrollLeft;
theY = event.clientY + document.body.scrollTop;
theWidth = document.body.clientWidth;
theHeight = document.body.clientHeight;
}}

Ydiff = Math.round(theY * (2*255/(theHeight+1)) - 255);

adjX = Math.round(theX * (total/theWidth));

R = arrR[adjX] - Ydiff; if (R<0) R = 0; if (R>255 || isNaN®) R=255;
G = arrG[adjX] - Ydiff; if (G<0) G = 0; if (G>255 || isNaN(G)) G=255;
B = arrB[adjX] - Ydiff; if (B<0) B = 0; if (B>255 || isNaN(B)) B=255;

document.bgColor = ‘#’ + Dec2Hex® + Dec2Hex(G) + Dec2Hex(B);
window.status = ‘Welcome to Project Rainbow!’;
}

if (NN) {
document.captureEvents(Event.MOUSEMOVE);

}

document.onmousemove = squeak;

// -->[/code]

Read full topic
